method.description: Return the current chorus send level for a given voice. (0 to 1).

method.name: get_reverb_room
method.description: Return the current reverb room type for a given voice (see REVERB_* enum).

method.name: get_reverb
method.description: Return the current reverb send level for a given voice. (0 to 1).

constants.constant: HighPass filter is used for voice.
Filter is disabled for voice.
Huge reverb room (cathedral, warehouse).
Medium reverb room (street)
Small reverb room (house room).
Lowpass filter is used for voice.
Large reverb room (Theather)
Band-Limit filter is used for voice, in this case resonance is the highpass cutoff.
Notch filter is used for voice.
Bandpass filter is used for voice.

class.name: ScenarioFX
class.description: Deprecated, will go away.

class.name: ScrollBar
class.brief_description: Base class for scroll bars.
class.description: Scrollbars are a [Range] based [Control], that display a draggable area (the size of the page). Horizontal ([HScrollBar]) and Vertical ([VScrollBar]) versions are available.

class.name: Separator
class.brief_description: Base class for separators.
class.description: Separator is a [Control] used for sepataring other controls. It's purely a visual decoration. Horizontal ([HSeparator]) and Vertical ([VSeparator]) versions are available.

class.name: Shader
class.brief_description: To be changed, ignore.
class.description: To be changed, ignore.

class.name: Skeleton
class.brief_description: Skeleton for characters and animated objects.
class.description: Skeleton provides a hierachial interface for managing bones, including pose, rest and animation (see [Animation]). Skeleton will support rag doll dynamics in the future.

method.name: add_bone
method.description: Add a bone, with name "name". [method get_bone_count] will become the bone index.

method.name: find_bone
method.description: Return the bone index that matches "name" as its name.

method.name: get_bone_name
method.description: Return the name of the bone at index "index"

method.name: get_bone_parent
method.description: Return the bone index which is the parent of the bone at "bone_idx". If -1, then bone has no parent. Note that the parent bone returned will always be less than "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_parent
method.description: Set the bone index "parent_idx" as the parent of the bone at "bone_idx". If -1, then bone has no parent. Note: "parent_idx" must be less than "bone_idx".

method.name: get_bone_count
method.description: Return the amount of bones in the skeleton.

method.name: get_bone_rest
method.description: Return the rest transform for a bone "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_rest
method.description: Set the rest transform for bone "bone_idx"

method.name: bind_child_node_to_bone
method.description: Deprecated soon

method.name: unbind_child_node_from_bone
method.description: Deprecated soon

method.name: get_bound_child_nodes_to_bone
method.description: Deprecated Soon

method.name: clear_bones
method.description: Clear all the bones in this skeleton.

method.name: get_bone_pose
method.description: Return the pose transform for bone "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_pose
method.description: Return the pose transform for bone "bone_idx".

class.name: Spatial
class.brief_description: Base class for all 3D nodes.
class.description: Spatial is the base for every type of 3D [Node]. It contains a 3D [Transform] which can be set or get as local or global. If a Spatial [Node] has Spatial children, their transforms will be relative to the parent.

method.name: set_transform
method.description: Set the transform locally, relative to the parent spatial node.

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Return the local transform, relative to the bone parent.

method.name: set_global_transform
method.description: Set the transform globally, relative to worldspace.

method.name: get_global_transform
method.description: Return the gloal transform, relative to worldspace.

method.name: get_parent_spatial
method.description: Return the parent [Spatial], or an empty [Object] if no parent exists or parent is not of type [Spatial.

constants.constant: Spatial nodes receive this notification when the viewport next to it in ascending hierarchy changed the [Scenario].
Spatial nodes receive this notifacation with their global transform changes. This means that either the current or a parent node changed it's transform.

class.name: SpotLight
class.brief_description: Spotlight Light, such as a reflector spotlight or a latern.
class.description: A SpotLight light is a type of [Light] node that emits lights in a specific direction, in the shape of a cone. The light is attenuated through the distance and this attenuation can be configured by changing the energy, radius and attenuation parameters of [Light]. TODO: Image of a spotlight.

class.name: SquirrelScript
class.brief_description: Squirrel script language support.
class.description: [html a href="http://squirrel-lang.org/"]Squirrel Language[html /a] support for the engine. Allows to load a [Script] from a .sq or .nut source or compiled file, or bundled it into scenes.

class.name: StaticBody
class.brief_description: PhysicsBody for static collision objects.
class.description: StaticBody implements a static collision [Node], by utilizing a rigid body in the [PhysicsServer]. Static bodies are used for static collision. For more information on physics body nodes, see [PhysicsBody].

class.name: StreamPeer
class.brief_description: Abstraction and base class for stream-based protocols.
class.description: StreamPeer is an abstration and base class for stream-based protocols (such as TCP or Unix Sockets). It provides an API for sending and receiving data through streams as raw data or strings.

method.name: put_data
method.description: Send a chunk of data through the connection, blocking if necesary until the data is done sending. This function returns an [Error] code.

method.name: put_partial_data
method.description: Send a chunk of data through the connection, if all the data could not be sent at once, only part of it will. This function returns two values, an [Error] code and an integer, describing how much data was actually sent.

method.name: get_data
method.description: Return a chunk data with the received bytes. The amount of bytes to be received can be requested in the "bytes" argument. If not enough bytes are available, the function will block until the desired amount is received. This function returns two values, an [Error] code and a data array.

method.name: get_partial_data
method.description: Return a chunk data with the received bytes. The amount of bytes to be received can be requested in the "bytes" argument. If not enough bytes are available, the function will return how many were actually received. This function returns two values, an [Error] code, and a data array.

class.name: StyleBox
class.brief_description: Base class for dawing stylized boxes for the UI.
class.description: StyleBox is [Resource] that provides an abstract base class for dawing stylized boxes for the UI. StyleBoxes are used for dawing the styles of buttons, line edit backgrounds, tree backgrounds, etc. and also for testing a transparency mask for pointer signals. If mask test fails on a StyleBox assigned as mask to a control, clicks and motion signals will go through it to the one below.

method.name: test_mask
method.description: Test a position in a rectangle, return wether it pases the mask test.

method.name: set_default_margin
method.description: Set the default offset "offset" of the margin "margin" (see MARGIN_* enum) for a StyleBox, Controls that draw styleboxes with context inside need to know the margin, so the border of the stylebox is not occluded.

method.name: get_default_margin
method.description: Return the default offset of the margin "margin" (see MARGIN_* enum) of a StyleBox, Controls that draw styleboxes with context inside need to know the margin, so the border of the stylebox is not occluded.

method.name: get_margin
method.description: Return the offset of margin "margin" (see MARGIN_* enum).

method.name: get_minimum_size
method.description: Return the minimum size that this stylebox can be shrunk to.

method.name: get_offset
method.description: Return the "offset" of a stylebox, this is a helper function, like writing Point2( style.get_margin(MARGIN_LEFT), style.get_margin(MARGIN_TOP) )

class.name: StyleBoxEmpty
class.brief_description: Empty stylebox (does not display anything).
class.description: Empty stylebox (really does not display anything).

class.name: StyleBoxImageMask
class.brief_description: Image mask based StyleBox, for mask test.
class.description: This StyleBox is similar to [StyleBoxTexture], but only meant to be used for mask testing. It takes an image and applies stretch rules to determine if the poit clicked is masked or not.

method.name: set_image
method.description: Set the image used for mask testing. Pixels (converted to grey) that have a value, less than 0.5 will fail the test.

method.name: get_image
method.description: Return the image used for mask testing. (see [method set_imag]).

method.name: set_expand
method.description: Set the expand property (default). When expanding, the image will use the same rules as [StyleBoxTexture] for expand. If not expanding, the image will always be tested at its original size.

method.name: get_expand
method.description: Return wether the expand property is set(default). When expanding, the image will use the same rules as [StyleBoxTexture] for expand. If not expanding, the image will always be tested at its original size.

method.name: set_expand_margin_size
method.description: Set an expand margin size (from enum MARGIN_*). Parts of the image below the size of the margin (and in the direction of the margin) will not expand.

method.name: get_expand_margin_size
method.description: Return the expand margin size (from enum MARGIN_*). Parts of the image below the size of the margin (and in the direction of the margin) will not expand.

class.name: VScrollBar
class.brief_description: Vertical version of [ScrollBar], which goes from left (min) to right (max).

class.name: VSeparator
class.brief_description: Vertical version of [Separator].
class.description: Vertical version of [Separator]. It is used to separate objects horizontally, though (but it looks vertical!).
